  • Constructor Details

    • ServerApp

      public ServerApp​(int port, long matchId)
      Parameters:
      port - server port
      matchId - match id to assignate to the next match created (0 if just started, old value if restarted)

  • Method Details

    • closeController

      public void closeController​(ServerController controller)
      if a game ended add controller to closed list In case Server crush this list will not Reload If user try to reconnect this list is not used (cant reconnect to ended game)
      Parameters:
      controller - controller to close

    • start

      public void start()
      Initialize the server and then wait for clients

    • connection

      public void connection()
      Initialize socket on the setted port

    • waitNewClients

      public void waitNewClients()
      Infinite loop that accept new client

    • acceptClient

      public void acceptClient()
      wait a client, when a client try to connect this function create a dedicated thread to handle it

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      parse server arguments
      Parameters:
      args - arguments to launch server (-res,-leaderfree,-resall..) -res cheat for chest -resall cheat for chest and storage -leaderfree can activate leader with no prerequisite -reconnect reload server state

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect​(String nickname, long id, Socket s)
      When a user try to reconnect this function is called by fakeController observable
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickame of reconnected player
      id - match to reconnect
      s - socket of the waiting room

    • searchMatchFromId

      public boolean searchMatchFromId​(long id, Socket socket, String nickname)
      search inside Online matches if exist a match with this id and try to reconnect user
      Parameters:
      id - match id
      socket - socket of user trying to reconnect
      nickname - nickname of user to reconnect
      Returns:
      true if user reconnect correctly

    • restoreFromFile

      public void restoreFromFile​(long id, Socket socket, String nickname)
      Try to load a match with id from file
      Parameters:
      id - match id
      socket - socket of user trying to reconnect
      nickname - nickname of user to reconnect

    • singleLogin

      public void singleLogin​(String nickname, Socket s)
      execute login single player from fakeController
      Parameters:
      nickname -
      s - waiting room socket

    • login

      public void login​(String nickname, Socket s)
      execute login for this player from fakecontroller
      Parameters:
      nickname - client nickanme
      s - waiting room socket

    • createHandler

      public void createHandler​(ServerController c, Socket s, Packet redirect)
      create a clientHandler for a new user
      Parameters:
      c - server controller assigned to player
      s - waiting room socket
      redirect - login or single player packet

    • createRealClientThread

      public void createRealClientThread​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Create a new Thread to handle the client connection
      Parameters:
      clientHandler -

    • findFreeController

      public ServerController findFreeController​(String nickname)
      Find the first match available (if not exist create one)
      Parameters:
      nickname - login nickname
      Returns:
      the available controller or a new one if all occupated
